verses.verse: וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <WH3947> took עַם־ <WH5971> Then the people הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the land אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוֹאָחָ֖ז <WH3059> Jehoahaz בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יֹאשִׁיָּ֑הוּ <WH2977> of Josiah וַיַּמְלִיכֻ֥הוּ <WH4427> and made him king תַֽחַת־ <WH8478> place אָבִ֖יו <WH1> in his father's בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> stead in Jerusalem

בֶּן־ <WH1121> old שָׁל֧וֹשׁ <WH7969> and three וְעֶשְׂרִ֛ים <WH6242> [was] twenty שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> years יוֹאָחָ֣ז <WH3099> Jehoahaz בְּמָלְכ֑וֹ <WH4427> when he began to reign וּשְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> three חֳדָשִׁ֔ים <WH2320> months מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> in Jerusalem

וַיְסִירֵ֥הוּ <WH5493> put him down מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> And the king מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> of Egypt בִּֽירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> at Jerusalem וַֽיַּעֲנֹשׁ֙ <WH6064> and condemned אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the land מֵאָ֥ה <WH3967> in an hundred כִכַּר־ <WH3603> talents כֶּ֖סֶף <WH3701> of silver וְכִכַּ֥ר <WH3603> and a talent זָהָֽב׃ <WH2091> of gold

וַיַּמְלֵ֨ךְ <WH4427> king מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> And the king מִצְרַ֜יִם <WH4714> of Egypt אֶת־ <WH853> אֶלְיָקִ֣ים <WH471> made Eliakim אָחִ֗יו <WH251> his brother עַל־ <WH5921> over יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> over Judah וִיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> and Jerusalem וַיַּסֵּ֥ב <WH5437> and turned אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> his name יְהוֹיָקִ֑ים <WH3079> to Jehoiakim וְאֶת־ <WH853> יוֹאָחָ֤ז <WH3099> Jehoahaz אָחִיו֙ <WH251> his brother לָקַ֣ח <WH3947> took נְכ֔וֹ <WH5224> And Necho וַיְבִיאֵ֖הוּ <WH935> and carried מִצְרָֽיְמָה׃ <WH4714> him to Egypt פ

בֶּן־ <WH1121> old עֶשְׂרִ֨ים <WH6242> [was] twenty וְחָמֵ֤שׁ <WH2568> and five שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> years יְהוֹיָקִ֣ים <WH3079> Jehoiakim בְּמָלְכ֔וֹ <WH4427> when he began to reign וְאַחַ֤ת <WH259> a עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <WH6240> ten שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> and he did הָרַ֔ע <WH7451> [that which was] evil בְּעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהָֽיו׃ <WH430> his God

עָלָ֣יו <WH5921> against עָלָ֔ה <WH5927> Against him came up נְבוּכַדְנֶאצַּ֖ר <WH5019> Nebuchadnezzar מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king בָּבֶ֑ל <WH894> of Babylon וַיַּֽאַסְרֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH631> and bound בַּֽנְחֻשְׁתַּ֔יִם <WH5178> him in fetters לְהֹלִיכ֖וֹ <WH1980> take בָּבֶֽלָה׃ <WH894> him to Babylon

וּמִכְּלֵי֙ <WH3627> of the vessels בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD הֵבִ֥יא <WH935> also carried נְבוּכַדְנֶאצַּ֖ר <WH5019> Nebuchadnezzar לְבָבֶ֑ל <WH894> to Babylon וַיִּתְּנֵ֥ם <WH5414> and put בְּהֵיכָל֖וֹ <WH1964> them in his temple בְּבָבֶֽל׃ <WH894> at Babylon

וְיֶתֶר֩ <WH3499> Now the rest דִּבְרֵ֨י <WH1697> of the acts יְהֽוֹיָקִ֜ים <WH3079> of Jehoiakim וְתֹֽעֲבֹתָ֤יו <WH8441> and his abominations אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עָשָׂה֙ <WH6213> which he did וְהַנִּמְצָ֣א <WH4672> and that which was found עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> against הִנָּ֣ם <WH2005> behold כְּתוּבִ֗ים <WH3789> in him behold they [are] written עַל־ <WH5921> against סֵ֛פֶר <WH5612> in the book מַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel וִֽיהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> and Judah וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <WH4427> reigned יְהוֹיָכִ֥ין <WH3078> and Jehoiachin בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <WH8478> his place פ

בֶּן־ <WH1121> old שְׁמוֹנֶ֤ה <WH8083> [was] eight שָׁנִים֙ <WH8141> years יְהוֹיָכִ֣ין <WH3078> Jehoiachin בְּמָלְכ֔וֹ <WH4427> when he began to reign וּשְׁלֹשָׁ֤ה <WH7969> three חֳדָשִׁים֙ <WH2320> months וַעֲשֶׂ֣רֶת <WH6235> and ten יָמִ֔ים <WH3117> days מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> and he did הָרַ֖ע <WH7451> [that which was] evil בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וְלִתְשׁוּבַ֣ת <WH8666> was expired הַשָּׁנָ֗ה <WH8141> And when the year שָׁלַח֙ <WH7971> sent הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king נְבֽוּכַדְנֶאצַּ֔ר <WH5019> Nebuchadnezzar וַיְבִאֵ֣הוּ <WH935> and brought בָבֶ֔לָה <WH894> him to Babylon עִם־ <WH5973> with כְּלֵ֖י <WH3627> vessels חֶמְדַּ֣ת <WH2532> with the goodly בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיַּמְלֵךְ֙ <WH4427> king אֶת־ <WH853> צִדְקִיָּ֣הוּ <WH6667> and made Zedekiah אָחִ֔יו <WH251> his brother עַל־ <WH5921> over יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> over Judah וִֽירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> and Jerusalem פ

בֶּן־ <WH1121> old עֶשְׂרִ֧ים <WH6242> and twenty וְאַחַ֛ת <WH259> [was] one שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> years צִדְקִיָּ֣הוּ <WH6667> Zedekiah בְמָלְכ֑וֹ <WH4427> when he began to reign וְאַחַ֤ת <WH259> a עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <WH6240> ten שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> and reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> in Jerusalem

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> And he did הָרַ֔ע <WH7451> [that which was] evil בְּעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהָ֑יו <WH430> his God לֹ֣א <WH3808> did not נִכְנַ֗ע <WH3665> [and] humbled מִלִּפְנֵ֛י <WH6440> not himself before יִרְמְיָ֥הוּ <WH3414> Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֖יא <WH5030> the prophet מִפִּ֥י <WH6310> [speaking] from the mouth יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וְ֠גַם <WH1571> also בַּמֶּ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> against king נְבֽוּכַדְנֶאצַּר֙ <WH5019> Nebuchadnezzar מָרָ֔ד <WH4775> And he also rebelled אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who הִשְׁבִּיע֖וֹ <WH7650> who had made him swear בֵּֽאלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> by God וַיֶּ֤קֶשׁ <WH7185> but he stiffened אֶת־ <WH853> עָרְפּוֹ֙ <WH6203> his neck וַיְאַמֵּ֣ץ <WH553> and hardened אֶת־ <WH853> לְבָב֔וֹ <WH3824> his heart מִשּׁ֕וּב <WH7725> from turning אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

גַּ֠ם <WH1571> Furthermore כָּל־ <WH3605> all שָׂרֵ֨י <WH8269> Moreover all the chief הַכֹּהֲנִ֤ים <WH3548> of the priests וְהָעָם֙ <WH5971> and the people הִרְבּ֣וּ <WH7235> much [לִמְעֹול־ כ] (לִמְעָל־ <WH4603> transgressed מַ֔עַל <WH4603> transgressed ק) כְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all תֹּעֲב֣וֹת <WH8441> after all the abominations הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> of the heathen וַֽיְטַמְּאוּ֙ <WH2930> and polluted אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> the house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which הִקְדִּ֖ישׁ <WH6942> which he had hallowed בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> in Jerusalem

וַיִּשְׁלַ֡ח <WH7971> sent יְהוָה֩ <WH3068> And the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֨י <WH430> God אֲבוֹתֵיהֶ֧ם <WH1> of their fathers עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <WH5921> unto בְּיַ֥ד <WH3027> to them by מַלְאָכָ֖יו <WH4397> his messengers הַשְׁכֵּ֣ם <WH7925> rising up betimes וְשָׁל֑וֹחַ <WH7971> and sending כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because חָמַ֥ל <WH2550> because he had compassion עַל־ <WH5921> on עַמּ֖וֹ <WH5971> on his people וְעַל־ <WH5921> and on מְעוֹנֽוֹ׃ <WH4583> and on his dwelling place

וַיִּֽהְי֤וּ <WH1961> become מַלְעִבִים֙ <WH3931> But they mocked בְּמַלְאֲכֵ֣י <WH4397> the messengers הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God וּבוֹזִ֣ים <WH959> and despised דְּבָרָ֔יו <WH1697> his words וּמִֽתַּעְתְּעִ֖ים <WH8591> and misused בִּנְבִאָ֑יו <WH5030> his prophets עַ֠ד <WH5704> until עֲל֧וֹת <WH5927> arose חֲמַת־ <WH2534> until the wrath יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּעַמּ֖וֹ <WH5971> against his people עַד־ <WH5704> until לְאֵ֥ין <WH369> there מַרְפֵּֽא׃ <WH4832> till [there was] no remedy

וַיַּ֨עַל <WH5927> Therefore he brought עֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <WH5921> against אֶת־ <WH853> מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> upon them the king [כַּשְׂדִּיִּים כ] (כַּשְׂדִּ֗ים <WH3778> Chaldeans ק) וַיַּהֲרֹ֨ג <WH2026> who slew בַּחוּרֵיהֶ֤ם <WH970> their young men בַּחֶ֙רֶב֙ <WH2719> with the sword בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> in the house מִקְדָּשָׁ֔ם <WH4720> of their sanctuary וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> no חָמַ֛ל <WH2550> and had no compassion עַל־ <WH5921> against בָּח֥וּר <WH970> upon young man וּבְתוּלָ֖ה <WH1330> or maiden זָקֵ֣ן <WH2205> old man וְיָשֵׁ֑שׁ <WH3486> or him that stooped for age הַכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> he gave בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <WH3027> [them] all into his hand

וְ֠כֹל <WH3605> All כְּלֵ֞י <WH3627> And all the vessels בֵּ֤ית <WH1004> of the house הָאֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> of God הַגְּדֹלִ֣ים <WH1419> great וְהַקְּטַנִּ֔ים <WH6996> and small וְאֹֽצְרוֹת֙ <WH214> and the treasures בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְאֹצְר֥וֹת <WH214> and the treasures הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king וְשָׂרָ֑יו <WH8269> and of his princes הַכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all הֵבִ֥יא <WH935> all [these] he brought בָבֶֽל׃ <WH894> to Babylon

וַֽיִּשְׂרְפוּ֙ <WH8313> And they burnt אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> the house הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God וַֽיְנַתְּצ֔וּ <WH5422> and brake down אֵ֖ת <WH853> חוֹמַ֣ת <WH2346> the wall יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem וְכָל־ <WH3605> all אַרְמְנוֹתֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH759> all the palaces שָׂרְפ֣וּ <WH8313> and burnt בָאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> thereof with fire וְכָל־ <WH3605> all כְּלֵ֥י <WH3627> vessels מַחֲמַדֶּ֖יהָ <WH4261> all the goodly לְהַשְׁחִֽית׃ <WH7843> and destroyed ס

וַיֶּ֛גֶל <WH1540> carried he away הַשְּׁאֵרִ֥ית <WH7611> And them that had escaped מִן־ <WH4480> from הַחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> from the sword אֶל־ <WH413> to בָּבֶ֑ל <WH894> to Babylon וַֽיִּהְיוּ־ <WH1961> become ל֤וֹ וּלְבָנָיו֙ <WH1121> to him and his sons לַעֲבָדִ֔ים <WH5650> where they were servants עַד־ <WH5704> until מְלֹ֖ךְ <WH4427> until the reign מַלְכ֥וּת <WH4438> of the kingdom פָּרָֽס׃ <WH6539> of Persia

לְמַלֹּ֤אות <WH4390> To fulfil דְּבַר־ <WH1697> the word יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD בְּפִ֣י <WH6310> by the mouth יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <WH3414> of Jeremiah עַד־ <WH5704> until רָצְתָ֥ה <WH7521> had enjoyed הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> until the land אֶת־ <WH853> שַׁבְּתוֹתֶ֑יהָ <WH7676> her sabbaths כָּל־ <WH3605> All יְמֵ֤י <WH3117> [for] as long as הָשַּׁמָּה֙ <WH8074> she lay desolate שָׁבָ֔תָה <WH7673> she kept sabbath לְמַלֹּ֖אות <WH4390> to fulfil שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> threescore and ten שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> years פ

וּבִשְׁנַ֣ת <WH8141> year אַחַ֗ת <WH259> Now in the first לְכ֙וֹרֶשׁ֙ <WH3566> of Cyrus מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king פָּרַ֔ס <WH6539> of Persia לִכְל֥וֹת <WH3615> might be accomplished דְּבַר־ <WH1697> that the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּפִ֣י <WH6310> [spoken] by the mouth יִרְמְיָ֑הוּ <WH3414> of Jeremiah הֵעִ֣יר <WH5782> stirred up יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> ר֙וּחַ֙ <WH7307> the spirit כּ֣וֹרֶשׁ <WH3566> of Cyrus מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king פָּרַ֔ס <WH6539> of Persia וַיַּֽעֲבֶר־ <WH5674> sent קוֹל֙ <WH6963> A proclamation בְּכָל־ <WH3605> throughout מַלְכוּת֔וֹ <WH4438> throughout all his kingdom וְגַם־ <WH1571> and also בְּמִכְתָּ֖ב <WH4385> and [put it] also in writing לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying ס

כֹּה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֞ר <WH559> Thus saith כּ֣וֹרֶשׁ ׀ <WH3566> Cyrus מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king פָּרַ֗ס <WH6539> of Persia כָּל־ <WH3605> all מַמְלְכ֤וֹת <WH4467> All the kingdoms הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> of the earth נָ֣תַן <WH5414> given לִ֗י יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> hath the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> of heaven וְהֽוּא־ <WH1931> and He פָקַ֤ד <WH6485> me and he hath charged עָלַי֙ <WH5921> and לִבְנֽוֹת־ <WH1129> me to build ל֣וֹ בַ֔יִת <WH1004> him an house בִּירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בִּֽיהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> which [is] in Judah מִֽי־ <WH4310> Whoever בָכֶ֣ם מִכָּל־ <WH3605> of all עַמּ֗וֹ <WH5971> his people יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> may the LORD אֱלֹהָ֛יו <WH430> his God עִמּ֖וֹ <WH5973> with וְיָֽעַל׃ <WH5927> [be] with him and let him go up
